answers.answer: Hello,only your doctor can answer about medical treatment.   However for the proteinuria it is very important that the boy has his blood sugars normalised and tightly controlled.  What is his A1C?  If it is high then he and you need to be working with a diabetes educator on his diet and medication to get things normalised.
